mapper.insert: insert into c_login_log (LOGIN_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_TYPE) values (#{loginId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginType,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select LOGIN_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_TYPE from c_login_log
